structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXIII. WORLD TRADE CENTER DEVELOPMENT COMMITTEE

text.section:
Sec. 2-991. Creation; purpose.
There is hereby created and established an advisory committee to be known as the World Trade Center Development Committee. Its purpose shall be to negotiate with potential developers of a World Trade Center to be located in Miami-Dade County and to recommend to the Board of County Commissioners a proposed developer and a Final Development Agreement. The recommendation shall be submitted to the Board of County Commissioners no later than December 31, 1997.
